## divider() function

Create a divider line.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function divider(char?: string, width?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

char


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Character to repeat (default: 'â”€')


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

width


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Number of times to repeat the character (default: 40)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

A string containing the divider line

## Remarks

Renders a horizontal line using a repeated character.

## Example


```typescript
vstack(
  text('Section 1'),
  divider(),
  text('Section 2'),
  divider('=', 50)
)
```
